si.title: විසුරුවා හරින ලද භූමිකාව
body_lines: දෙමළ ජනතාවට බලය බෙදා ගැනීමට කැමති නැති ජාතික පුද්ගලයින්ට ජනවාර්ගික ගැටලුව විසඳිය හැක්කේ කෙසේද?

en.title: Dispersed role
body_lines: How can the national people who are not willing to share powers to the Tamils ​​can solve the ethnic problem?

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:

National leaders unwilling to share power with Tamils must address ethnic issues through dialogue, compromise, and inclusive governance. This approach can help resolve long-standing conflicts and promote reconciliation between communities.
